channel.title: Piston help idk where to post this
channel.description:
hey im trying to make a door that starts closed, when u hit a lever it opens with pistons... how would i wire this. it looks like this
=========================== =========================== =========================== ===========P_____========== ===========V====_========== ======___p-+++-p_==_======= =====_===p-+++-p=_==__L~=== ====_=====w^w===_===~===== =====_=====+P+=====_~====== =====________R______======== ============O============== ===========================
= means cobblestone P = piston p- -p means open piston *activated* R means redstone torch _ means redstone L = lever and ~ means redstone leading to lever it wont open (well close) the pistons

item.title: Piston help idk where to post this
item.dc:creator: @F4ketribal F4ketribal
item.description:
@F4ketribal wrote:

hey im trying to make a door that starts closed, when u hit a lever it opens with pistons…
how would i wire this. it looks like this

===========================

===========================
===========P_____==========
===========V==============
======p-++±p=========
========p-++±p===__L~===
=========w^w======~=====
==========+P+=====~======
=====__R========
============O==============

= means cobblestone
P = piston
p- -p means open piston activated
R means redstone torch
_ means redstone
L = lever
and ~ means redstone leading to lever
it wont open (well close) the pistons

Read full topic
item.source: Piston help idk where to post this
